title: Experience of using OPTIMO
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I like the fact that you can have all your products and revenue streams on one platform and sell them anywhere in the world at anytime. I also like the fact that they have numerous APIs and data fields to allow me to use the best CRM software and build my own applications to bespoke certain applications specifically for my business.
cons: Cons: Can't think of anything I didn't like in particular
overall: Overall: I have used OPTIMO to unify revenue streams, improve management controls and increase sales and delivery efficiency. The experience has been very good, nothing is too much trouble and I advent ended up in constant debates about cost.

title: Excel in everywhere
name: Romesh I.
pros: Pros: We are using Optimo since 2017 Aug. We found that their support and continues training o new releases are the thing that made them an industry leader. as a eventmanagemmnt and consulting feirm we are recomading Oprimo Software.
cons: Cons: Because of their current client list, We thought that Optimo software is for large enterprises, so we initially avoid them as a medium-sized business, when they arrive at our doorstep, We got to know, Optimo pricing really match with our budget and they are extremely good at implementing, So I suggesting Optimo to promote in the SME sector too.
overall: Overall: Satisfactory and hapy to have a friend like partner.

title: Super friendly and quick support from the initial consultation to implementation.
name: David B.
pros: Pros: Due to the module based system, we can select only what we need for running our business.
cons: Cons: No noticeable cons. When we face some implementation issues, we received very good support. So we don't have anything to mention here.
overall:
Overall: Mainly we can recommend this software to any event management company or a place that host event because this software is specially designed for massive events. we have implement this software to one of our client and they are very satisfied with the flow and the way this software work.

The comprehensive dashboard Giving more access to information and take better decisions.

Every feature of this software is well design to suit the specific needs. This software helps management team to forecast and prepare their place.

title: Amazing software to manage events & venues
name: Kyle R.
pros: Pros: This is just like a specialised ERP system for events and venues. From ticketing to voucher management, hospitality to seat arrangements, Optimo has it all. Their customer service is also great.
cons: Cons: So far, noting to complain
overall: Overall: In Optimo you find an all in one platform for venue and event management which is simply amazing. I haven't come across a product quite similar to this one. This system is a real game changer !
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Every venue manager should try this product
